1500x + 1800(8 − x) = 13 500
1500x + 1800·8 − 1800x = 13 500
1800·8 = 14 400, por lo que:
1500x − 1800x + 14 400 = 13 500
(1500 − 1800)x + 14 400 = 13 500
−300x + 14 400 = 13 500
−300x = 13 500 − 14 400 = −900
x = (−900)/(−300) = 3.
Luego, y = 8 − 3 = 5.
